REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes and directs the metropolitan transportation authority to implement a fare refund program for canceled or delayed Long Island Rail Road trains
Summary: Authorizes and directs the metropolitan transportation authority to implement a fare refund program for canceled or delayed Long Island Rail Road trains.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing and directing the metropolitan transportation authority to implement a fare refund program for canceled or delayed Long Island Rail Road trains
